description: Athletic, military hunk Dante Colle is on leave and he’s looking for a place to stay. He stops to ask chiseled blondie, JJ Knight, for suggestions. JJ happily points him in the direction of a cheap motel and secretly follows Dante into the room. Surprised, Dante doesn’t know what to do, but quickly gives in to his manly frustrations for a piece of dick in his ass and a good blowjob.
title: On Leave Part 1
